34 // Class definitions
37 enum class AnimationTransitionType {
38  kSmooth = 0, // Clip A and B both play as A fades into B
39  kFirstFrozen // Clip A is paused while fading into B
40 };
41

48 class TransitionSettings: public Serializable {
49 public:
50 
51  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
54 
56  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
57 
59  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
60 
62 
63  AnimationTransitionType m_transitionType = AnimationTransitionType::kSmooth;
64 
66  float m_fadeInTimeSec = 0;
67  float m_fadeInBlendWeight = 1.0;
68 
69  float m_fadeOutTimeSec = 0;
70  float m_fadeOutBlendWeight = 1.0;
71 };
75 class AnimationTransition: public BaseAnimationState{
76 public:
77  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
80 
81  AnimationTransition(AnimationStateMachine* stateMachine);
82  AnimationTransition(AnimationStateMachine* stateMachine, int connectionIndex);
83  ~AnimationTransition();
85 
86  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
89 
90  TransitionSettings& settings() { return m_settings; }
91 
92  const Timer& timer() const { return m_timer; }
93 
95  float transitionTime() const {
96  return std::max(m_settings.m_fadeInTimeSec, m_settings.m_fadeOutTimeSec);
97  }
98 
99  bool isDone() const {
100  return m_timer.getElapsed<float>() > transitionTime();
101  }
102 
104  void getClips(const Motion& motion, std::vector<AnimationPlayData>& outData, std::vector<float>& outWeights, ResourceCache* cache) const;
105 
106  const AnimationState* start() const;
107  const AnimationState* end() const;
108 
109  StateConnection& connection() const;
110 
112  virtual AnimationStateType stateType() const override { return AnimationStateType::kTransition; }
113 
115  virtual void onEntry(Motion& motion) const override;
116 
118  virtual void onExit(Motion& motion) const override;
119 
121 
122  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
125 
127  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
128 
130  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
131 
133 
134 private:
135  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
138 
140 
141  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
144 
146  mutable Timer m_timer;
147 
148  // TODO: Maybe a different set of settings if reversed
149  TransitionSettings m_settings;
150 
152 };
